duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver Fire Protection Engineering subject matter expertise for DoD federal government, Military, and Intelligence Community partners.
Participate in the creation of design analyses, conceptual designs, program requirements, and system selection for Fire Protection Systems.
Collaborate in a design team environment with engineers, designers, and project managers.
Interface with mission partners, clients, and Authorities Having Jurisdiction (AHJ) to prepare, validate, and deliver key design efforts.
Receive mentorship from Mid-Level and Senior Professionals to grow and expand career.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Fire Protection Engineering (ABET accredited)
Engineer-in-training (EIT) or NICET Level 3 and above
